ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Type__c, "Certificate of Coverage"), ISCHANGED(Milestone__c), NOT( OR( TEXT(Milestone__c) = TEXT(PRIORVALUE(Milestone__c)), AND( TEXT(Milestone__c) = "Data Collection", TEXT(PRIORVALUE(Milestone__c)) = "Record Created" ), AND( TEXT(Milestone__c) = "Record Created", TEXT(PRIORVALUE(Milestone__c)) = "Data Collection" ), AND( TEXT(Milestone__c) = "Initial Review", TEXT(PRIORVALUE(Milestone__c)) = "Data Collection" ), AND( TEXT(Milestone__c) = "Data Collection", TEXT(PRIORVALUE(Milestone__c)) = "Initial Review" ), AND( TEXT(Milestone__c) = "Preparation", TEXT(PRIORVALUE(Milestone__c)) = "Initial Review" ), AND( TEXT(Milestone__c) = "Initial Review", TEXT(PRIORVALUE(Milestone__c)) = "Preparation" ), AND( TEXT(Milestone__c) = "Review", TEXT(PRIORVALUE(Milestone__c)) = "Preparation" ), AND( TEXT(Milestone__c) = "Preparation", TEXT(PRIORVALUE(Milestone__c)) = "Review" ), AND( TEXT(Milestone__c) = "Filing", TEXT(PRIORVALUE(Milestone__c)) = "Review" ), AND( TEXT(Milestone__c) = "Review", TEXT(PRIORVALUE(Milestone__c)) = "Filing" ), AND( TEXT(Milestone__c) = "Record Completed", TEXT(PRIORVALUE(Milestone__c)) = "Filing" ), AND( TEXT(Milestone__c) = "Filing", TEXT(PRIORVALUE(Milestone__c)) = "Record Completed" ) ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: WorkRecord_VR05: Each milestone must be completed in order.
